reviewText: It's a European movie.  I found out when I received it.  No refunds on that since I opened it.

This is a great product for exercise without a lot of space.  The Loop Bands are convenient for people that always are on the move. Also they do not take up a lot of room, like most exercise equipment would.

My husband and I actually picked up a copy of this video at Goodwill one day and decided to try it out on our four year old and two year old.  The results?  THEY LOVED IT!  It is a live action Belle for a change and live action puppeted characters with children in the mix as well.  This video uses old Disney cartoons, refurbished by songs sung by Belle herself as a story to the children.  The stories have great little lessons like learning when is playtime and when is work time; also being persistent untill you finish something that you have set out to do.

  For a different spin on the same old Disney Princesses, I would highly reccomen this series!
